use.flag: Patches meson crossfiles to accept custom CFLAGS/CXXFLAGS.

Install Valve Proton's 'dxvk_config.dll' which is used to load 'dxvk.conf' options 'dxgi.customVendorId', 'dxgi.customDeviceId', and 'dxgi.nvapiHack' into wine without the need for DXVK's 'dxgi.dll'. This is for custom Proton installations but if you want to use it outside of Proton your wine build would need to be patched with this commit from Valve's wine repository.: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/wine/commit/84d73a7fa55c13ed797b2b2f6cfb9071dceac800#diff-fcca5e3c4012a42cc338e49e90a5bd29
